title: House for rent in close to battaramulla (file number 3A)
details:
House for rent in close to battaramulla (file number 3A)

Two story house ( sqft 3000)
Totally three bedrooms and two bathrooms

Ground floor
Large living room
One bedroom with one common bathroom
Pantry, wet kitchen
Outside Servant room, servant toilet


First floor
Large tv lobby
2 bedrooms
one common bathroom
Large rooftop area

Two car parks
Large garden
the fully tiled floor.
Unfurnished.
Separate entrance.

Per month: 75,000/-

Payment conditions: 1 year upfront payment

1-month security deposit.(refundable)
